alert.note: Alert for Roane (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 9:55PM EDT until May 08 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 430 AM EDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of Central West Virginia and central West Virginia, including the following counties, in Central West Virginia, Braxton. In central West Virginia, Calhoun, Clay, Gilmer and Roane. * WHEN...Until 430 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 954 PM EDT, Flooding is ongoing. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Gassaway, Big Otter, Wallback, Nebo, Nicut, Chloe, Servia, Rosedale, Orma, Shock, Wilsie, Frametown, Tariff and Procious. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Report Flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 800 401 9535, when you can do so safely.
